string.text: Fast Hands
Increases your stow and ready speed

Increases your stow and ready speed by a total of 10%.


Max Perk Level: 5

Increases your stow and ready speed by a total of 20%.


Max Perk Level: 5

Increases your stow and ready speed by a total of 30%.


Max Perk Level: 5

Increases your stow and ready speed by a total of 40%.


Max Perk Level: 5

Increases your stow and ready speed by a total of 50%.


Max Perk Level: 5
Ghost Ammo

You have a chance to refund ammo when hitting a target (chance doubles on a critical hit).


Max Perk Level: 5

You have a 1% chance to refund ammo when hitting a target (2% chance on a critical hit).


Max Perk Level: 5

You have a 2% chance to refund ammo when hitting a target (4% chance on a critical hit).


Max Perk Level: 5

You have a 3% chance to refund ammo when hitting a target (6% chance on a critical hit).


Max Perk Level: 5

You have a 4% chance to refund ammo when hitting a target (8% chance on a critical hit).


Max Perk Level: 5

You have a 5% chance to refund ammo when hitting a target (10% chance on a critical hit).


Max Perk Level: 5
Gunslinger
You now deal increased damage with Pistols and SMGs.

You now deal 5% increased damage with Pistols and SMGs.


Max Perk Level: 3

You now deal 10% increased damage with Pistols and SMGs.


Max Perk Level: 3

You now deal 15% increased damage with Pistols and SMGs.


Max Perk Level: 3
Rifleman
You now deal increased damage with Assault Rifles.

You now deal 5% increased damage with Assault Rifles.


Max Perk Level: 3

You now deal 10% increased damage with Assault Rifles.


Max Perk Level: 3

You now deal 15% increased damage with Assault Rifles.


Max Perk Level: 3
Heavy Gunner
You now deal increased damage with Shotguns, Snipers, and Explosive Weapons (excludes grenades).

You now deal 5% increased damage with Shotguns, Snipers, and Explosive Weapons (excludes grenades).


Max Perk Level: 3

You now deal 10% increased damage with Shotguns, Snipers, and Explosive Weapons (excludes grenades).


Max Perk Level: 3

You now deal 15% increased damage with Shotguns, Snipers, and Explosive Weapons (excludes grenades).


Max Perk Level: 3
Berserker
You now deal increased melee damage and take reduced damage when you have a melee weapon in your hand.

You now deal 5% increased melee damage and take 2.5% reduced damage when you have a melee weapon in your hand.


Max Perk Level: 3

You now deal 10% increased melee damage and take 5% reduced damage when you have a melee weapon in your hand.


Max Perk Level: 3

You now deal 15% increased melee damage and take 7.5% reduced damage when you have a melee weapon in your hand.


Max Perk Level: 3
Jamming Shot
You can now jam an enemy's weapon when shooting them in the arm.

You can now jam an enemy's weapon when shooting them in the arm.


Max Perk Level: 1
Bloody Mess
When killing an enemy, they have a 1% chance to explode, damaging anyone caught in the blast (including YOU).

When killing an enemy, they have a 1% chance to explode, damaging anyone caught in the blast (including YOU).


Max Perk Level: 5

When killing an enemy, they have a 2% chance to explode, damaging anyone caught in the blast (including YOU).


Max Perk Level: 5

When killing an enemy, they have a 3% chance to explode, damaging anyone caught in the blast (including YOU).


Max Perk Level: 5

When killing an enemy, they have a 4% chance to explode, damaging anyone caught in the blast (including YOU).


Max Perk Level: 5

When killing an enemy, they have a 5% chance to explode, damaging anyone caught in the blast (including YOU).


Max Perk Level: 5
Disarming Shot
Shooting an enemy's weapon has a 15% chance for them to drop it on the ground.

Shooting an enemy's weapon has a 15% chance for them to drop it on the ground.


Max Perk Level: 1
Scavenger
When looting an enemy, you have a small chance to find salvage and crafting materials.

When looting an enemy, you have a 7% chance to find salvage and crafting materials.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 14% chance to find salvage and crafting materials.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 21% chance to find salvage and crafting materials.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 28% chance to find salvage and crafting materials.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 35% chance to find salvage and crafting materials.


Max Perk Level: 5
Careful Handler
When looting armor and weapons from an enemy, they will have a minimum condition of 15%.

When looting armor and weapons from an enemy, they will have a minimum condition of 15%.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting armor and weapons from an enemy, they will have a minimum condition of 20%.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting armor and weapons from an enemy, they will have a minimum condition of 25%.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting armor and weapons from an enemy, they will have a minimum condition of 30%.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting armor and weapons from an enemy, they will have a minimum condition of 35%.


Max Perk Level: 5
Master Craftsman
When crafting or cooking, you have a 10% chance to make 2 crafted items for the cost of 1.

When crafting or cooking, you have a 10% chance to make 2 crafted items for the cost of 1.


Max Perk Level: 1
Cyber-Medic
You have become outfitted with an implant that helps to slowly stop bleeding wounds.

You have become outfitted with an implant that helps to slowly stop bleeding wounds. It won't replace a bandage however.


Max Perk Level: 3

Improvements to the implant now doubles its efficiency at stopping bleeding.


Max Perk Level: 3

This final upgrade causes the implant to passively stop bleeding at triple its original rate. Although roughly 10% effective compared to a bandage, its effects are noticable are won't require any medical items.


Max Perk Level: 3
Dodger
You have a small chance to dodge any incoming damage.

You have a 0.5% chance to dodge any incoming damage.


Max Perk Level: 5

You have a 1% chance to dodge any incoming damage.


Max Perk Level: 5

You have a 1.5% chance to dodge any incoming damage.


Max Perk Level: 5

You have a 2% chance to dodge any incoming damage.


Max Perk Level: 5

You have a 2.5% chance to dodge any incoming damage.


Max Perk Level: 5
Comfort Food
When eating or drinking, you will receive a health bonus equal to a portion of their thirst or hunger restore (whichever restore is highest).

When eating or drinking, you will receive a health bonus equal to a portion of their thirst or hunger restore (whichever restore is highest).


Max Perk Level: 1
Ammo Finder
Increases the amount of ammo found when looting a body.

Increases the amount of ammo found when looting a body by 20%.


Max Perk Level: 5

Increases the amount of ammo found when looting a body by 40%.


Max Perk Level: 5

Increases the amount of ammo found when looting a body by 60%.


Max Perk Level: 5

Increases the amount of ammo found when looting a body by 80%.


Max Perk Level: 5

Increases the amount of ammo found when looting a body by 100%.


Max Perk Level: 5
Medicine Man
When looting an enemy, you have a chance to find a medical item. Item quality increases with this perk's level.

When looting an enemy, you have a 7% chance to find a medical item. Item quality increases with this perk's level.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 14% chance to find a medical item. Item quality increases with this perk's level.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 21% chance to find a medical item. Item quality increases with this perk's level.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 28% chance to find a medical item. Item quality increases with this perk's level.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 35% chance to find a medical item. Item quality increases with this perk's level.


Max Perk Level: 5
Arte-finder
When looting an enemy, you have a small chance to find an artefact native to your current location. Additionaly, any artefact you find will now have higher-than-normal efficiency.

When looting an enemy, you have a 5% chance to find an artefact native to your current location. Additionaly, any artefact you find will now have higher-than-normal efficiency (up to 24 - 28% percent).


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 10% chance to find an artefact native to your current location. Additionaly, any artefact you find will now have higher-than-normal efficiency (up to 26 - 30% percent).


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 15% chance to find an artefact native to your current location. Additionaly, any artefact you find will now have higher-than-normal efficiency (up to 28 - 32% percent).


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 20% chance to find an artefact native to your current location. Additionaly, any artefact you find will now have higher-than-normal efficiency (up to 32 - 36% percent).


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 25% chance to find an artefact native to your current location. Additionaly, any artefact you find will now have higher-than-normal efficiency (up to 36 - 40% percent).


Max Perk Level: 5
Midas' Touch
You will receive bonus cash when looting it from dead enemies.

You will receive 5% bonus cash when looting it from dead enemies.


Max Perk Level: 5

You will receive 10% bonus cash when looting it from dead enemies.


Max Perk Level: 5

You will receive 15% bonus cash when looting it from dead enemies.


Max Perk Level: 5

You will receive 20% bonus cash when looting it from dead enemies.


Max Perk Level: 5

You will receive 25% bonus cash when looting it from dead enemies.


Max Perk Level: 5
Master of the Zone
You have learned the tricks of the Zone and how to tap into the Noosphere. With this power, any artefacts attached to your belt will slowly begin to repair themselves.

You have learned the tricks of the Zone and how to tap into the Noosphere. With this power, any artefacts attached to your belt will slowly begin to repair themselves.


Max Perk Level: 1
Plate Finder
When looting an enemy, you have a small chance to find a damaged Kevlar Plate on them.

When looting an enemy, you have a 5% chance to find a damaged Kevlar Plate on them.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 10% chance to find a damaged Kevlar Plate on them.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 15% chance to find a damaged Kevlar Plate on them.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 20% chance to find a damaged Kevlar Plate on them.


Max Perk Level: 5

When looting an enemy, you have a 25% chance to find a damaged Kevlar Plate on them.


Max Perk Level: 5
Spiked
When taking damage, your enemy is also hurt for a portion of said damage.

When taking damage, your enemy is also hurt for 5% of said damage.


Max Perk Level: 5

When taking damage, your enemy is also hurt for 10% of said damage.


Max Perk Level: 5

When taking damage, your enemy is also hurt for 15% of said damage.


Max Perk Level: 5

When taking damage, your enemy is also hurt for 20% of said damage.


Max Perk Level: 5

When taking damage, your enemy is also hurt for 25% of said damage.


Max Perk Level: 5
Anomaly Defense
Anomalies will deal reduced damage to you.

Anomalies will deal 2.5% reduced damage to you.


Max Perk Level: 5

Anomalies will deal 5% reduced damage to you.


Max Perk Level: 5

Anomalies will deal 7.5% reduced damage to you.


Max Perk Level: 5

Anomalies will deal 10% reduced damage to you.


Max Perk Level: 5

Anomalies will deal 12.5% reduced damage to you.


Max Perk Level: 5
Iron Resolve
You will now recover faster from any dizziness or drunkeness effects.

You will now recover slightly faster from any dizziness or drunkeness effects.


Max Perk Level: 3

You recover much faster from any dizziness or drunkeness effects.


Max Perk Level: 3

You recover even faster from any dizziness or drunkeness effects.


Max Perk Level: 3
Silver-Tongued
When bartering, you receive better prices when buying or selling.

When bartering, you receive 5% better prices when buying or selling.


Max Perk Level: 5

When bartering, you receive 10% better prices when buying or selling.


Max Perk Level: 5

When bartering, you receive 15% better prices when buying or selling.


Max Perk Level: 5

When bartering, you receive 20% better prices when buying or selling.


Max Perk Level: 5

When bartering, you receive 25% better prices when buying or selling.


Max Perk Level: 5
Mutant Slayer
You now deal more damage to mutants.

You now deal 5% more damage to mutants.


Max Perk Level: 5

You now deal 10% more damage to mutants.


Max Perk Level: 5

You now deal 15% more damage to mutants.


Max Perk Level: 5

You now deal 20% more damage to mutants.


Max Perk Level: 5

You now deal 25% more damage to mutants.


Max Perk Level: 5
Vampirism
Vampirism - When killing an enemy, you are granted a small amount of Health and Stamina.

Vampirism - When killing an enemy, you are granted 0.25% Health and Stamina.


Max Perk Level: 3

Vampirism - When killing an enemy, you are granted 0.5% Health and Stamina.


Max Perk Level: 3

Vampirism - When killing an enemy, you are granted 0.75% Health and Stamina.


Max Perk Level: 3
Warmonger
When killing an enemy, you receive a third of your weapon's magazine size as ammo to your backpack (Min. mag size of 3).

When killing an enemy, you receive a third of your weapon's magazine size as ammo to your backpack (Min. mag size of 3).


Max Perk Level: 1
Fighting Stance
You swing melee weapons much faster.

You now swing melee weapons 10% faster.


Max Perk Level: 5

You now swing melee weapons 20% faster.


Max Perk Level: 5

You now swing melee weapons 30% faster.


Max Perk Level: 5

You now swing melee weapons 40% faster.


Max Perk Level: 5

You now swing melee weapons 50% faster.


Max Perk Level: 5
Deadeye
You randomly will deal a critical hit that deals more damage.

You have a 0.1% base chance to deal a critical hit. Your critcal hits multiply your damage by 25%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Lucky Strike will override your critical hit chance.

You have a 0.1% base chance to deal a critical hit. Your critcal hits multiply your damage by 50%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Lucky Strike will override your critical hit chance.

You have a 0.1% base chance to deal a critical hit. Your critcal hits multiply your damage by 75%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Lucky Strike will override your critical hit chance.

You have a 0.1% base chance to deal a critical hit. Your critcal hits multiply your damage by 100%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Lucky Strike will override your critical hit chance.

You have a 0.1% base chance to deal a critical hit. Your critcal hits multiply your damage by 125%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Lucky Strike will override your critical hit chance.
Lucky Strike
You have a higher chance of landing critical hits.

You have a 1% chance of landing critical hits that multiply your damage by 10%. Landing a headshot will increase this chance to 1.5%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Deadeye will override your critical damage multiplier.

You have a 4% chance of landing critical hits that deal multiply your damage by 10%. Landing a headshot will increase this chance to 6%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Deadeye will override your critical damage multiplier.

You have a 9% chance of landing critical hits that deal multiply your damage by 10%. Landing a headshot will increase this chance to 13.5%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Deadeye will override your critical damage multiplier.

You have a 16% chance of landing critical hits that deal multiply your damage by 10%. Landing a headshot will increase this chance to 24%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Deadeye will override your critical damage multiplier.

You have a 25% chance of landing critical hits that deal multiply your damage by 10%. Landing a headshot will increase this chance to 37.5%.


Max Perk Level: 5


NOTE: Points into Deadeye will override your critical damage multiplier.
